title: Absalomâ€™s Conspiracy
summary: Absalom wins the hearts of the people and declares himself king in Hebron, launching a rebellion. David flees Jerusalem with his loyal followers to avoid bloodshed, showing humility and sorrow.

faq.question: How did Absalom steal the hearts of the people?
faq.answer: By presenting himself as a just and approachable leader at the city gate.

faq.question: What did David do when he learned of the rebellion?
faq.answer: He fled Jerusalem to avoid conflict and trusted God for the outcome.
